For sale are three southern league players.  Asking $40 each or $110 for all three.  Paypal preferred, price includes delivery charges.  Priority will be given to anyone making on offer on the entire lot.

Dom Mullaney - Old Mill
Dutch Revelle - Piedmont 
Foley White (Houston) - Old Mill

Price reduction before hitting Ebay Sunday.
